title: installer script is lost in master, which existed in d15.2
body: We have been developing mono based products that need to build on Linux, and we had been using install-mono-prefix.sh to locally install msbuild into local mono builds. It had been almost fine. Now master branch seems to have removed it and there is no alternative way to achieve the same for local mono setup.

nodes.body: nevermind, it was only about mono fork of msbuild. (No idea why the original doesn't provide that script either thouguh.)
